column1: ANNOUNCEMENT: Jared will be addressing Mainers around 1:30 with an election announcement. Go to his Facebook page to watch live! https://t.co/Au8uIC3ZHM  #mepolitics #ME02

I wanted to take a moment as the polls close to say thank you one more time to all our volunteers and supporters.   I’m so proud of the positive honest campaign we ran and I know none of it is possible without all of you. - Jared #mepolitics

One hour until polls are scheduled to close here in Maine. Remember if you're in line at 8pm you can vote!  If you have last-minute questions or need to find your polling location this voter information hotline can help you get answers quick: (207) 990-0788  #mepolitics

Nelly's got a big ol’ smile because Mainers can register to vote on election day AND polls are open until 8pm. Plenty of time to get to your polling place and vote for Jared! #goldens4golden  Find your polling place here: https://t.co/oj7UfqJNyL #mepolitics https://t.co/IMmQ19kcDp

Jared’s closing statement from the last debate is worth another watch. We need humble dedicated public servants in Congress who are focused on doing right by their constituents not partisan politics. That’s Jared.  It’s election day. Go vote! https://t.co/oDPEe65FdH #mepolitics https://t.co/ySjMlypOYF

Our team ran into Daryl while we were getting out the vote in Hampden today.   Daryl wanted you to know he has:  - already voted - cast his ballot for @golden4congress  - a great pup named Reilly  You can be like Daryl. Vote today!  https://t.co/EH4Kfjchd6 #mepolitics #GOTV https://t.co/twKbul82xd

- Mainers can still register to vote! - Find your polling place at https://t.co/EH4Kfjchd6 or call (207) 990-0788.  Whatever you do make a plan to vote and get yourself your friends and your family to the polls! #mepolitics 2/

It’s election day! Here’s what you need to know: - Most polling locations open by 8am. - If you're in line by 8pm tonight you'll be able to vote - You can still drop off your absentee ballot at your town clerk's office or at a drop box if your town has one.  1/ #mepolitics

Joining volunteers in Ellsworth for our last stop before Election Day. These folks went out to talk to fellow Mainers who haven't cast their ballots yet and work with them to make a plan to vote.  If you're voting tomorrow make your plan here: https://t.co/oj7UfqJNyL #mepolitics https://t.co/tWoeA1QBpU

We’ve hit all 11 counties in #ME02 over the course of this campaign and we’re not done yet! Great to get a tour of Bigelow Brewing last week and chat with voters in Skowhegan. #mepolitics https://t.co/FhxLLhwLgy

Feeling the momentum here in Waldo County heading into election day!  Jared joined another big canvass here in Belfast this morning ready to turn out some voters. #mepolitics #GOTV https://t.co/2wfoIvwNEP

Great to join this huge volunteer crew in Bethel! A little rain won't stop us getting out the vote in Oxford County today.   Thanks to everyone who came out to #GOTV with us this weekend. #mepolitics https://t.co/IwLPETzduq

Jared started the day in Farmington this morning to launch a canvass and thank volunteers. 2 more days to go and folks are fired up to #GOTV! #mepolitics  If you've already cast your ballot there's still more you can do. Sign up here to get out the vote: https://t.co/rrqgbDp3Xj https://t.co/6TZ8KWH0fs

Remember if you have an absentee ballot it's too late to put it in the mail. You'll need to drop it off at your town clerk's office or at a drop box if your town has one.   Find answers to your voting questions at https://t.co/0jFGWxoQu9 or by calling (207) 990-0788. 2/

If you haven’t voted yet it’s time to join your friends family and neighbors and MAKE A PLAN to drop off your absentee ballot or vote in person on election day. 1/   #mepolitics https://t.co/YfuQoE4Fsh

This campaign is powered by volunteers regular folks who take time out of their weekends evenings and in between shifts to join the fight for working Mainers.   It was great to join our volunteers in Dover-Foxcroft and thank them for their hard work. - Jared  #mepolitics https://t.co/m7bREjXcgS

If you haven’t voted yet it’s time to join your friends family and neighbors and MAKE A PLAN to drop off your absentee ballot or vote on election day.  Find out all your need to know at https://t.co/0jFGWxoQu9 or by calling (207) 990-0788. #mepolitics https://t.co/OODGNJPCpA

The next 3 days are all about getting out the vote. Jared was in Bangor this morning to meet volunteers and help send out a group to knock doors & make calls.  It’s not too late to get involved! Sign up for a shift here: https://t.co/vP72Kew65i #mepolitics https://t.co/OF4ry5IWy4

For 70 years Old Town's Rotary Club has marked the start of deer season by sending hunters off w/ a good breakfast. It’s traditions like this one that make Maine such a great place.  Jared helped serve the hunters this AM and chatted w/ folks before they headed out. #mepolitics https://t.co/HkMrVS7K9M

Mainers: Today is the LAST DAY TO VOTE EARLY IN PERSON.  If you can’t vote today you can still drop off your absentee ballot thru election day or vote in person on Tuesday.  Answers to your questions can be found at https://t.co/0jFGWxoQu9 or by calling 207-990-0788. #mepolitics https://t.co/UcLcQHRPBk

“The only way to fix this is to grab ahold of it and say ‘we’re going to fight for change.’”  Washington is broken. Jared is fighting the dark money and corporate power that broke it. #mepolitics https://t.co/RJ3DDbWEVM
To find information on your nearest polling place registering to vote or checking your registration status go here: https://t.co/EH4Kfjchd6

Proud to cast my vote at my local polling place Lewiston City Hall. The whole process took 10 minutes: quick easy and poll workers were on hand if anyone needed help.   Use your voice and get yourself your family and your friends to the polls. - Jared  #mepolitics https://t.co/XoI0UbdqlC

Heska feels strongly about good government & fighting corruption. She’s glad to see Jared wrote a bill to crack down on dark money in elections won’t take corporate PAC money and backs legislation banning members of Congress from becoming lobbyists. #Goldens4golden #mepolitics https://t.co/rVWHOfg8c5

If you're planning to mail your ballot don't wait. Put it in the mail today.   Starting Weds it's recommended that you drop off your ballot at your polling place rather than mail it. If you have any questions call or text (207) 990-0788 or visit https://t.co/EH4Kfjchd6. https://t.co/3L64PYLO7U

7 days.   That’s all we have left to fight to send leaders to Washington who will expand affordable health care clean up corruption & dark money and bridge our political divides.   We need you to help us get out the vote! Sign up here: https://t.co/KDMtNNC4h5   #mepolitics https://t.co/xjTZK3RlOh

Great to grab a beer with firefighters from Lewiston-Auburn and around the state last weekend. We discussed how to make more mental health resources available to firefighters and the importance of collective bargaining and enjoyed some @BrewSideByEach brews.   #mepolitics https://t.co/bfQpOvN1dt

As Jared said in last week's debate “politics doesn’t have to be a blood sport.”  Jared’s worked hard to run an honest positive campaign focused on his record. No bomb-throwing lying or partisan attacks just issues that matter to Mainers. #mepolitics  Our closing ad of 2020: https://t.co/LAZQEwPbA2
Great to join Bangor fire fighters at the Hose 5 Fire Museum in Bangor. Thanks for having me @Local_772 https://t.co/QIz9c1unZj

Murphy’s a patriot to his very core. He's getting everyone he knows to vote & he’s not interested in your excuses this year.  There’s still time for Mainers to register request an absentee ballot or vote in person.  Click: https://t.co/oj7UfqJNyL  #Goldens4Golden #mepolitics https://t.co/vQoINKnMDN

Aida & Scully aren’t golden retrievers but they're still #goldens4golden  They know that no matter your political breed — Democrat Republican Independent or Portuguese Water Dog — if you believe in putting the country over politics Team Golden has a place for you #mepolitics https://t.co/p5Yqed3dB3

Jared's introduced an aggressive plan to fight corruption and dark money in Washington. He's taking the fight to the corporations and special interests.   https://t.co/YkkZchxWiO  #mepolitics #me02debate

Fact check: USMCA is just NAFTA with a fancy new name. And NAFTA was a disaster for #ME02.  Here’s what one of the administration’s key allies in the Senate thinks of the deal  Source: https://t.co/Cni7kIgJSD  #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/dlHFW9jYrb

Jared is proud to have earned an A+ rating from the Sportsman’s Alliance of Maine the foremost hunting and Second Amendment rights group in our state.   #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/o2qTWipQC2

Dale Crafts said this month he wants to privatize Social Security.   The last time this idea was considered 70% of taxpayers would've had their benefits cut.  Crafts on privatization: https://t.co/1hRjdQx2uZ Source on SS cuts: https://t.co/aqA0Rnz3iC  #mepolitics #me02debate
Jared on Social Security and Medicare:   #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/gjRG2YgUVl

If Dale gets his way on ACA repeal:  - 105000 Mainers lose their insurance - # of uninsured Mainers triples to 15% of population - Maine loses $746 million in fed’l funding  And Dale has NO PLAN to replace any of this.   Source: https://t.co/3FxrrbA6rW  #mepolitics #me02debate

Jared’s working to provide *more* options for affordable health care not take options away from people. He would never vote to ban private health insurance.   Find out more at https://t.co/ujJKMkx4uC #mepolitics #me02debate
Fact Check: ACA insurance rates in Maine have decreased for the past three years.  #mepolitics #me02debate  https://t.co/8kzVgYp4km
Dale wants to repeal the ACA. He has NO PLAN to replace it.  There were literally zero specifics in that answer. Dale has NO PLAN.   #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/pzVgg9NIB9

I support the bipartisan COVID-19 relief plan outlined by the Problem Solvers Caucus as the best path forward to get a deal that meets the needs of the American people.   Details about the plan here: https://t.co/NdYQrzPMBF  #mepolitics #me02politics

State and local funding as a part of COVID-19 relief isn't a partisan issue Dale. If they don't receive federal relief local taxes go up and services like police and schools get cut. #mepolitics #me02debate   https://t.co/8lts53LXMN

TONIGHT: We’re heading into the 3rd #ME02debate w/ @MainePublic  Jared knows the job is about service to Mainers. That’s why throughout this campaign he's focused on his record the facts & getting things done for Maine. Not partisan attacks. #mepolitics  https://t.co/oCWvyNvGld
Senator King has a long impressive history of leadership independence and service to our state. I'm honored to have his endorsement in this election. - Jared   #MEpolitics https://t.co/oWXLKxdUHT
VOTE VOTE VOTE.   Find information about dropping your ballot in the mail and voting in person at your local polling place here: https://t.co/gU8Kvdcjhi #mepolitics https://t.co/OwFKWQEQjR

Proud to have the endorsement of the Professional Fire Fighters of Maine! I’ll always stand up for brave first responders and fight to make sure they have the resources they need.   #mepolitics @PFFMaine https://t.co/ZP2B2Gt5ta

On the urgent issues facing our country from COVID-19 relief to economic recovery America needs leaders who work to bring people together and get things done.   That's the record I've earned and the job I'll continue to do.   #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/gCpai7qr6M
Fact Check: Jared kept the promise he made to voters not to vote for Nancy Pelosi for Speaker of the House. He'll do it again.   #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/Vx3c55UuED
Sec. Bill Cohen is a model of independent leadership. He endorsed Jared in this race because he sees much of the same in Golden. #mepolitics #me02debate  https://t.co/8zGSAKMFlx

Fact Check: Jared ranks as one of the most independent members of Congress.   538 and ProPublica both list Golden as #5 of 232 House Democrats for independence based on the metric that matters: voting record.   Sources: https://t.co/N5EiC0g9u0 https://t.co/AKlvZqanTq https://t.co/xukhoVg7Ya
#mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/rAwk63CcV0
Quick refresher on how Dale Crafts has handled Second Amendment issues on this campaign: https://t.co/E420jNsmDL  #Mepolitics #me02debate

Dale Crafts wants to repeal the ACA.  Dr. Bien is on the front lines of the opioid crisis in our state: here’s what happens to his patients in recovery if they lose the care they receive through the ACA.   #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/flxoJA6JLn

Fact Check: Jared Golden spoke out against violence and rioting within days.  June 1: "We also cannot condone violent protests and riots that bring harm to innocent men and women damage homes and stores and further tear apart our communities." - Golden #mepolitics #me02debate
Retired Maine State Chief of Police Craig Poulin on Jared’s record supporting law enforcement: https://t.co/5J89lQ29ON  #mepolitics #Me02debate
Once more with feeling https://t.co/HhO2JeM8uV

There are many reasons why Maine doctors nurses and health care professionals support Jared Golden and oppose Dale Crafts but it all boils down to one thing: they want their patients to get the care they need.  Find out more at https://t.co/ujJKMkx4uC #mepolitics #me02debate
Dale Crafts wants to repeal the Affordable Care Act. Dr. Levy from Orono believes that would be a disaster for his patients. Watch:  #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/yqNXeUxUR4

Dale's friends in DC have been trying to repeal the ACA for a decade.They have NO PLAN to replace it.  Donald Trump has been promising a plan to replace the ACA for 5 years. Still NO PLAN.  Now Dale wants to repeal the ACA. He has NO PLAN to replace it.  #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/EilMfWNfzs

Dale Crafts continues to falsely claim that his policies wouldn’t eliminate health care protections for people with pre-existing conditions.   The facts have not changed and they are not on his side.   Thread below  #mepolitics #me02debate  https://t.co/xIztXwgdJG

Dale Crafts has said over and over again says he wants to repeal the Affordable Care Act.  If that happens 105000 Mainers would lose their health insurance. That’s the largest percentage increase in the nation.  https://t.co/3FxrrbA6rW  #mepolitics #me02debate
Jared’s record on health care: a pragmatic all-of-the-above approach to expanding access to affordable care lowering costs. #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/L6uigvmP97
Crafts has *tried* to explain why he voted against these tax cuts. He has not explained why these tax cuts are still a centerpiece of his campaign.  https://t.co/D26OncRJYM  #mepolitics #me02debate

DEBATE NIGHT: Tune in to @WMTWTV at 8pm to watch Jared make the case for affordable health care beating COVID-19 getting the economy back on track and independent leadership that seeks to bring Mainers together.  Following the #me02debate? Watch this space.   #mepolitics

Stopped to fuel up at Simones' Hot Dog Stand before heading down to @WMTWTV for tonight's debate. Can't miss hot dog Wednesdays!  Tune in at 8pm here: https://t.co/9KYMsg1TaU #mepolitics https://t.co/wCdELG9Qh8

I sat down with local health care providers in Bangor on Monday to discuss the Affordable Care Act & its impact on Mainers.  This health care law is essential. We have a lot of work to do to protect it and make it work better for Maine people. #mepolitics  https://t.co/BbRMiMLScJ

Great to join Travis Benjamin and Benjamin Motorsports last weekend at @OxfordPlains Speedway. Travis is sitting in 3rd for points so far this season!  The Benjamin Motorsports team is based in Waldo County. We're proud to have this local talent right here in #ME02 #mepolitics https://t.co/9CNE9ijHQD

Maine law enforcement officers often put themselves at risk — mentally and physically — to protect our communities.  I joined @namimaine & local chiefs of police last week to highlight new mental health resources for ME officers and other 1st responders. #mepolitics  Via: WMTW https://t.co/eNaxR4y4oa

George wants to GET OUT THE VOTE in the last 2 weeks before election day so he stopped by headquarters to sign up for a volunteer shift.  Join George to help Mainers cast their ballots and get out the vote for Jared: https://t.co/vP72Kew65i  #Goldens4Golden #mepolitics https://t.co/EkBUcIoJJ9

Dr. Grunblatt thinks Jared is working to move our health care system in the right direction: more access & lower costs.   For her patients ‘free market’ health care means if you get sick and can’t afford treatment you’re out of luck.   Visit https://t.co/ujJKMkx4uC #mepolitics https://t.co/QLvGALWD7b
We're proud to be a part of the Benjamin Motorsports team at the @OxfordPlains Speedway tomorrow.   Good luck to Travis and the crew! https://t.co/ZL4ly6XznN
Welcome to the team Lily!   #Goldens4Golden https://t.co/IqtgLrZxdD

I've worked hard to be your voice in Washington these past two years. I would be honored to continue to be your voice.  Thanks to @WABI_TV5 and @wagmtv8 for hosting tonight's debate.   #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/3SqkMcbIRV

Jared closes with:  "We can come together as Americans and demand that our government works for us to solve problems like ensuring that our health care is affordable for every one of us and beating the coronavirus so we can get our economy back on track." #mepolitics #me02debate
If Dale wants to compare resumes:  - served his country as a Marine - served his community in the State House - serving Maine's 2nd District in Congress  #mepolitics #me02debate

We sit and we listen to one another... You haven't heard me tonight trying to blame and scapegoat the other side. I'm just talking to you my constituents about serving this community. - Jared   #mepolitics #me02debate

Jared knows how important the Postal Service is for small towns and seniors in rural Maine. He's taken action to make sure the postal service recovers from the pandemic and keeps serving Mainers:  https://t.co/7qbDmsJq7B  #mepolitics #me02politics

Jared's prioritized expanding broadband infrastructure on rural Maine. Last year he brought the House Small Business Subcommittee he chairs to Machias for a hearing on improving broadband in Washington County.  #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/vBR2nJ3sbL
#mepolitics #me02debate ^^^

Fact Check: Jared Golden spoke out against violence and rioting within days.   June 1: "We also cannot condone violent protests and riots that bring harm to innocent men and women damage homes and stores and further tear apart our communities."  #mepolitics #me02politics
On law enforcement Dale Crafts is all talk  We have receipts:  https://t.co/lFfnEZuZkk https://t.co/LA8jJIPnn0 https://t.co/h1sM4TOlmG

Jared backs Maine law enforcement. Dale’s already been caught lying about this.   News Center Maine’s Verify says FALSE: https://t.co/0Byhreinr9  WMTW debunks claim-by-claim: https://t.co/fVILeORLWg  #mepolitics #me02debate
Retired Maine State Chief of Police Craig Poulin on Jared’s record supporting law enforcement: https://t.co/5J89lQ29ON  #mepolitics #me02debate
Mainers want independent leaders who put the needs of their country above their party. They did 45 years ago they do now. #mepolitics #me02debate  https://t.co/uuX9IKRAsG
Dale Crafts wants to repeal the Affordable Care Act.   Dr. Levy from Orono believes that would be "a disaster" for the patients he's cared for. Watch:  #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/XSI09ee2Bv

There are many reasons why Maine doctors nurses and health care professionals support Jared Golden and oppose Dale Crafts but it all boils down to one thing: they want their patients to get the care they need.  Find out more at https://t.co/ujJKMkx4uC   #mepolitics #me02debate

Jared's focused on helping rural communities in Maine including bridging the digital divide.   Earlier this year he introduced a bill to connect small businesses in rural Maine with the 'last mile' of broadband infrastructure. #mepolitics #me02debate https://t.co/4EmlotY60j

Jared grew up in a small business family. On the Small Business Committee he's worked hard to deliver for Maine small businesses.   Last year he passed a bill through the House to expand and reauthorize the 11 SBDC's in ME-02 #mepolitics #me02debate  https://t.co/Q4bOt7yhsb

Jared & his team have worked with 100s of Mainers to track down economic impact payments and apply for unemployment benefits and held tele-town halls that reached over 20k Mainers to provide the information they needed and connect them with resources. #mepolitics #me02debate 2/

When COVID-19 hit Maine Jared & his team had boots on the ground to help Mainers. The office set up a Small Business Response Team that has helped 100s of small biz navigate relief programs coordinate with federal agencies and connect with resources. #mepolitics #ME02debate 1/

This one just speaks for itself: https://t.co/aafaJGr8om  We can keep going but you probably get the picture.   No matter what Dale wishes were true facts are facts: Repeal the ACA protections for pre-existing conditions go away. 5/

President Trump likes to say he could repeal the ACA and replace it by executive order. The Associated Press fact checked calling that claim dubious.   Money quote: “There is no magic wand you can wave to just make it so.” https://t.co/wf4MPpqJmP 4/

Sen. Cornyn also wants to repeal the ACA but says he’ll protect pre-existing conditions. Like Dale he has no plan to replace the ACA with. Washington Post gave that claim four pinocchios.  https://t.co/1BNwjjd9H2 3/

Every independent fact-check we could find says repealing the ACA leads to millions of people with pre-existing conditions losing their health care. #mepolitics #me02debate  Here’s a quick run-through:  2/

THREAD: Dale Crafts wants to repeal the ACA which means about 590000 Mainers with pre-existing conditions could lose their health care.   He might not like that fact but it’s a fact.  #mepolitics #me02debate 1/

Since March Jared has consistently pushed party leaders to drop the political maneuvering and work together on a deal for add’l COVID-19 relief.   Last month he brought 34 fellow members of the House to put more pressure on Speaker Pelosi: https://t.co/7XrQAwVNBW  #mepolitics
I’ve always looked up to George as a model of common-sense and Maine values. I’m honored and humbled to have his endorsement in this election. - Jared   #mepolitics https://t.co/ljThUZWlu6

Dr. Levy from Orono supports Jared because he can’t be bought off by the drug companies. In Congress Jared takes the fight to big pharma to lower Rx drug prices.   Hear from Dr. Levy and other health care professionals at https://t.co/ujJKMkx4uC #mepolitics https://t.co/wcs23GFRaE

Huck’s just here to remind you to vote early if you can. Hop on over to your polling place or put that ballot in the mail TODAY!   Not sure whether you're registered to vote? Check your registration or get registered here: https://t.co/gDcDlgEL1X #goldens4golden #mepolitics https://t.co/81DycbK4mE

As an ER doc in Winterport Dr. Pattavina understands the consequences of patients delaying care because they can’t afford it.   He’s backing Jared because he’s the only candidate in the race committed to getting more people covered in an affordable way.  https://t.co/ujJKMkx4uC https://t.co/weqbnpPUpd

For nurses like Linda the choice this November is simple:  “Jared’s defended people with pre-existing conditions at every turn. His opponent? Not so much.”  Hear from Linda and other folks who provide care to Mainers here: https://t.co/XmgKLOeeVR  #mepolitics https://t.co/RA76To6r3j
Ken runs a long-term care center in Bangor. For him this election is a no-brainer: he’s voting for Jared.   Learn more at https://t.co/ujJKMkx4uC #mepolitics https://t.co/EgfTxqBriP

Oakley here will continue blowing raspberries at our opponent until he stops trying to repeal the Affordable Care Act and kick tens of 1000s of Mainers off their health care.   #goldens4golden  Oakley recommends https://t.co/ujJKMkx4uC  #MEpolitics https://t.co/t34amFXBHZ

Maggie got her crew together to make sure they all vote. Be like Maggie.  Find your registration status track your absentee ballot and see your nearest polling place here: https://t.co/HiMJn1dPI2  #Goldens4Golden https://t.co/6dzfpIz01i

The opioid crisis has worsened in Maine during the pandemic. Jared’s fighting for affordable care for folks in recovery.   “He’s the only candidate in the race who can say that.” - Dr. Bien  Learn more at https://t.co/ujJKMkx4uC https://t.co/JCL6Pz4MiV

Not a bad way to start the day -   @BDNOpinion:  "Jared's... focusing on issues important to his constituents bucking his party leadership at times and working across the aisle with like-minded legislators looking for results rather than constant gridlock.” #mepolitics https://t.co/RzoQApgyD1
Health care is a top issue for many Maine voters this election and for good reason.   Find out what Jared’s working on to improve care and expand access for his constituents:  https://t.co/XmgKLOeeVR

This is Cali. She’s getting on in years and she doesn’t take kindly to politicians who try to cut Medicare and Social Security benefits for her fellow retirees. She’s glad Jared’s committed to defending the benefits Maine seniors have earned.   #goldens4golden https://t.co/isv8ZXHLa8

Linda's a nurse from Corinth. She’s voting for Jared because he approaches his job the same way she does hers — he listens and he’s passionate about the work he does and the people he serves.  Learn more about why Linda supports Jared here: https://t.co/CK3Co2AX12   #mepolitics https://t.co/nY18uDBTNK
Thanks for your hard work @FranklinMEdems! https://t.co/1lOyq03FHl

Dark money groups are spending millions to attack Jared on TV.  There’s a way to fight back.  Join Team Golden for a Weekend of Action this Saturday & Sunday. Stand up to dark money and send Jared back to Congress to fight for working people. #mepolitics  https://t.co/OKP7ewEGxE

Too many of the patients Dr. Levy cared for told him they just couldn't afford their medications.  He’s backing Jared because Jared stands up to big pharma and works to lower Rx drug costs.  Hear from Dr. Levy & other Maine docs backing Jared: https://t.co/CK3Co2jm9u  #mepolitics https://t.co/9f2M7HHAhQ

We’re almost 30 days until election day and it’s all hands on deck.   Help send Jared back to Congress to fight for working Mainers. We need your help to make calls send postcards deliver yard signs and more!  Sign up for our Weekend of Action here! https://t.co/OKP7ewn5G6

TODAY: We’re launching Health Care Professionals for Golden.   Why are Maine’s doctors nurses and other health care workers backing Jared in this election? Find out at https://t.co/CK3Co2jm9u  #mepolitics

This is Maggie. She’s a little shy but she wanted to tell you that Team Golden is holding a Weekend of Action this Saturday and Sunday and we need your help!  She promises not to pee on the carpet if you sign up here: https://t.co/OKP7ewn5G6  #Goldens4Golden https://t.co/TxYRFGINu7
There are 435 members in the House of Representatives.   Only six of them have the guts to sign their name to legislation abolishing corporate PACs.   Jared’s one of them. https://t.co/1XMgiwQSek

That’s why one of the 1st bills Jared introduced when he got to Congress last year took the fight right to Big Pharma.   His FLAT Prices Act punishes drug companies that skyrocket the prices of life-saving medications like insulin.  2/  https://t.co/KSAJ0BtknK
